data.title: Duke Karl Theodor in Bavaria
data.text:
(* 9.8.1839, O 29.4.1874, † 30.11.1909)

Duchess Elisabeth in Bavaria, Empress consort of Austria

Duchess Maria Sophie in Bavaria, Queen consort of the Two Sicilies

Duchess Mathilde Ludovika in Bavaria

Duke Maximilian Joseph in Bavaria

(* 4.12.1808, O 9.9.1828, † 15.11.1888) Duke Pius August in Bavaria Princess Amélie Louise of Arenberg

Princess Ludovika of Bavaria

(* 30.8.1808, O 9.9.1828, † 25.1.1892)

Princess Elisabeth Ludovika of Bavaria, Queen consort of Prussia

Princess Amalie Auguste of Bavaria, Queen consort of Saxony

Princess Sophie Friederike of Bavaria, Archduchess of Austria

King Maximilian I Joseph of Bavaria

(* 27.5.1756, O 30.9.1785, O 9.3.1797, † 13.10.1825)

Count Palatine Friedrich Michael of Zweibrücken

(* 27.2.1724, O 6.2.1746, † 15.8.1767) Count Palatine Christian III of Zweibrücken Caroline of Nassau-Saarbrücken

Countess Palatine Maria Franziska of Sulzbach

(* 15.6.1724, O 6.2.1746, † 15.11.1794) Count Palatine Joseph Charles of Sulzbach Elizabeth Augusta of Neuburg

Princess Karoline of Baden, Queen consort of Bavaria

(* 13.7.1776, O 9.3.1797, † 13.11.1841)

Princess Louise of Baden, Empress consort of All the Russias

Princess Friederike Dorothea of Baden, Queen consort of Sweden

Princess Wilhelmine of Baden

Prince Karl Ludwig of Baden

(* 14.2.1755, O 15.7.1775, † 16.12.1801) Grand Duke Karl Friedrich of Baden

(* 22.11.1728, O 28.1.1751, † 10.6.1811) Landgravine Karoline Luise of Hesse-Darmstadt

Landgravine Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt

(* 20.6.1754, O 15.7.1775, † 21.6.1832) Landgrave Ludwig IX of Hesse-Darmstadt
